producers.name: Southern Africa Labour and Development Research Unit

version_statement.version_notes: Latest release with harmonized mental health variables

study_info.abstract: The National Income Dynamics Study (NIDS) is South Africa's first national longitudinal household survey. Wave 4 includes comprehensive data on socio-economic well-being and mental health indicators of South Africans.
study_info.geog_coverage: All nine provinces of South Africa with nationally representative sampling
study_info.data_kind: Survey data with mental health measures
study_info.universe: All individuals in surveyed households aged 15 years and above
